publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6285 Jim Mather: The Arbitration (Scotland) Act 2010 (Consequential Amendments) Order 2010—That the Justice Committee recommends that the Arbitration (Scotland) Act 2010 (Consequential Amendments) Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney*

S3M-6285 Jim Mather: The Arbitration (Scotland) Act 2010 (Consequential Amendments) Order 2010—That the Justice Committee recommends that the Arbitration (Scotland) Act 2010 (Consequential Amendments) Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney
S3M-6285 The Arbitration (Scotland) Act 2010 (Consequential Amendments) Order 2010 (lodged on 11 May 2010) Kenny MacAskill*
